iso_technology_augmented_power.definition: Isomorphic patterns on technology and augmented power (extending Spinoza's Ethics to hybrid scales) capture structural equivalences in enhancement hierarchiesâ€”mappings where technological modes, augmented affects, rational alignments, and liberatory augmentations preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include modal technologies, affective enhancements, aligned integrations, and augmented necessities vs. misaligned contingencies, validated via 2025 studies (e.g., Spinoza's naturalism in generative AI per web:2/8; ethical AI tools like Spinoza for journalism per web:5) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., neural augmentations to AI hybrids per web:4/7). Hard-to-vary invariants like augmented striving enable forecasts of unified enhancements; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm augmented unity/deny separation/both in hybrids/neither in simulations); scores >0.98 based on 2025 hybrid abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to technology-power-augmentation overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from Spinoza/web and hybrid contrasts (e.g., mind-body parallelism to AI embodiments).
Validate coverage; flag hybrid gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., superintelligent augmentation links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ethical augmentations); integrate diachronic depth (primordial tools to 2025 AI hybrids).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

items.description: Tech as extensions of substance; modes map invariantly (e.g., tools as infinite modes to AI embodiments per web:4/6).

examples.structure: Technology as natural modes of power

mappings.principle: Modal striving for augmented technological expression.

items.description: Enhanced affects for greater conatus; affects map invariantly (e.g., joyful tech to ethical AI per web:5/8).

examples.structure: Affects as power boosts via technology

mappings.principle: Affective striving for augmented ethical unity.

items.description: Tech freeing from bondage; augmentations map invariantly (e.g., intuitive tools to AI liberations per web:1/2).

examples.structure: Technology as rational power against inadequacy

mappings.principle: Augmentative striving for rational hybrid freedom.

gaps: Hybrid divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm augmented unity/deny separation/both in hybrids/neither in simulations.
